data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Chalan-Pago-Ordot you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chalan-Pago-Ordot, Guam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Chalan-Pago-Ordot.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Chalan-Pago-Ordot, Guam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,097 believers in the state of Chalan-Pago-Ordot with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Chalan Pago-Ordot Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Chalan Pago-Ordot Village, Chalan-Pago-Ordot, Guam.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Chalan-Pago-Ordot, Guam so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Chalan-Pago-Ordot, Guam from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Chalan-Pago-Ordot, Guam to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
